sen.e: Mochikiyo KYOGOKU (1407 - August 30, 1470 (August 4, 1470 by the old calendar)) was a Shugo Daimyo (Territorial Lord as Military Commissioner) of the Kyogoku clan during the mid to late Muromachi Period.
